About.paragraph: Hello! I’m Marek. I graduated with a Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science at <underscore>Uniwersytet Merito</underscore>. I develop applications in <underscore>Python</underscore> and <underscore>Node.js</underscore>, primarily focusing on backend development. However, I aspire to become a full-stack developer in the future ✨

Projects.heading: Projects

idleparts.title: Idleparts
idleparts.body: A website for e-commerce shopping including ordering and administration tools

social-life.title: Social Life
social-life.body: A social media platform where users can share posts, comment, and like content. You can also follow others and stay updated on their activities.

eventio.title: Eventio
eventio.body: An event management website that allows people to register or buy tickets. Event creators can specify if their event is free or paid.

tasksync.title: Tasksync
tasksync.body: The app lets users create a Kanban board with full CRUD operations for tasks and lists with drag and drop. Users can also invite others to their board to collaborate on tasks.

Projects.tooltip-hosting: Hosting might spin up to 1 min.

Contact.text: Feel free to contact me if you have any questions!
